The WiFi's free and the rooms are ok. The cafe works 24/7: try homemade tiramisu.

reviews.text: Four levels of pure pleasure like a real amsterdamian!
Hummus sandwich at the end and the sausage man at number 187.

Very nice hotel with friendly and always helpful staff. Location is excellent - 10 minutes walk from Central Station and quiet rooms facing one of the Amsterdam's channels. Free wifi. Nice jazz bar.
Very nice hotel.
The staff are amazing. I 'lost' my camera and they directed us to the police station. They asked how we got on when we got back. Great service here!
Very nice hotel with friendly staff. Coffee and tea selection in the room was very nice. Great location.
Very good hotel, honest price and a very comfortable bed. Coffee machine in the bedroom, iPod aplifier with alarm clock, cable tv, etc
Very nice hotel in a very good area

Very nice hotel

I will not stay here anymore. It's the most boring hotel in Amsterdam.
nice location and good price
Nice hotel. Spacious rooms and friendly staff.. Totally worth the money!
Nice and clean place. Great value for money!

Very designed small room , but in the heart of Amsterdam!!!! Don t take the rooms in the top floor (4th).
Hotel is nice and clean but it is situated in the district with sexshops and coffee shops...
Avoid rooms like 403 by the stairs as there are people stomping up and down them all night.
Small rooms but very well located. Don't provide breakfast nor other meals, only vending machines. Nonetheleas there are a lot of good restaurants in the street.

Clean but too efficient and loveless. Ok, but not cool.
